title: INI Parser
description: Parse INI-style configuration files, a simple text-based format for configuration with sections and key-value pairs.

motivation.why: INI files are one of the simplest configuration formats, widely used in Windows applications and many cross-platform tools. They're easy for humans to read and edit.

inputFormat.description: INI files have sections in square brackets and key=value pairs. Comments start with ; or #. All values are strings (no type inference).

examples.input:
; This is a comment
[settings]
# Also a comment

outputFormat.description: The parser returns an IniConfig struct with global key-values and a map of sections, each containing their own key-value pairs.

global.description: HashMap<String, String> for key-values before any section

sections.description: HashMap<String, HashMap<String, String>> for sectioned values
